title: TeX in Quarto
section: 1 TeX Snippets used in a TeX block

title: TeXQuarto
text:
2 Theorems in a TeX Block
Test Tex block
\[\begin{align*}
  & \int_0^2 (3x^2+1) dx \\
  &= {x^3} + x {\Big|}_0^2  \\
  &= (2^3 +2) - (0^3 + 0) \\
  &= 10 -(0) = 10 \qquad \blacksquare
\end{align*}\]

title: TeXQuarto
text:

  &= (2^3 +2) - (0^3 + 0) \\
  &= 10 -(0) = 10 \qquad \blacksquare
\end{align*}\]

title: TeXQuarto
section: 2 Theorems are written using div code-blocks
text:
2 Theorems are written using div code-blocks

#thm-line is used in div-ID to cross reference Theorem 1
tex-blocks are used to display equations within div
.proof is a class with the div block


Theorem 1 For any events A, B and C, defined on a sample space \(S\),
\[\begin{array}{l l}
a. Commutativity    & A \cup B = B \cup A,\\
                    & A \cap B = B \cap A;\\
b. Associativity    & A \cup (B \cup C) = (A \cup B)\cup C,\\
                    & A \cap (B \cap C) = (A \cap B)\cap C,\\
\end{array}\]

title: TeX in Quarto
text:
4 Equations in a TeX block
Use \begin{align*} block for equations (see snippet ali*) \[\begin{align*}
  & \int_0^2 (3x^2+1) dx \\
  &= {x^3} + x {\Big|}_0^2  \\
  &= (2^3 +2) - (0^3 + 0) \\
  &= 10 -(0) = 10 \qquad \blacksquare
\end{align*}\]
\begin{align*}

  &= {x^3} + x {\Big|}_0^2  \\
  &= (2^3 +2) - (0^3 + 0) \\
  &= 10 -(0) = 10 \qquad \blacksquare
\end{align*}

title: SymPy
text:
Sympy is a Python library for symbolic mathematics.
import math
math.sqrt(12)

\(\displaystyle 3.46410161513775\)
import sympy
sympy.sqrt(12)

\(\displaystyle 2 \sqrt{3}\)

title: SymPy
text: 1 differentiation and integration

title: SymPy
text:
1 Expand and Factor

from sympy import *
init_printing()

x, y = symbols('x y')
expr1 = (x+1)*(x+2)
pprint(expr1)
expand(expr1)

(x + 1)⋅(x + 2)


\(\displaystyle x^{2} + 3 x + 2\)



expr2 = x**3 + 3*x**2 + 3*x + 1

expr2
factor(expr2)

\(\displaystyle \left(x + 1\right)^{3}\)



expr3 = x+1
expr4 = x**3 + 3*x**2 + 3*x + 1
expr3

\(\displaystyle x + 1\)



expr4

\(\displaystyle x^{3} + 3 x^{2} + 3 x + 1\)

title: SymPy
text:
2 Differentiate and Integrate

x = symbols('x')
diff(sin(x)*exp(x), x)

\(\displaystyle e^{x} \sin{\left(x \right)} + e^{x} \cos{\left(x \right)}\)


Compute \(\int{e^{x} sin(x)} dx\)

integrate(exp(x)*sin(x))

\(\displaystyle \frac{e^{x} \sin{\left(x \right)}}{2} - \frac{e^{x} \cos{\left(x \right)}}{2}\)

title: SymPy
text:
2 Differentiation

x = symbols('x')
diff(sin(x)*exp(x), x)

\(\displaystyle e^{x} \sin{\left(x \right)} + e^{x} \cos{\left(x \right)}\)

title: SymPy
text:
3 Integration
Compute \(\int{e^{x} sin(x)} dx\)

integrate(exp(x)*sin(x))

\(\displaystyle \frac{e^{x} \sin{\left(x \right)}}{2} - \frac{e^{x} \cos{\left(x \right)}}{2}\)

title: SymPy
text:
3 Indefinite and Definite Integration
Compute \(\int{2 e^{x} sin(x)} dx\)

integrate(2*exp(x)*sin(x))

\(\displaystyle e^{x} \sin{\left(x \right)} - e^{x} \cos{\left(x \right)}\)



Compute \(\int_{-\infty}^\infty sin(x^2) dx\)

from sympy import *
θ = symbols('θ')
integrate(sin(θ**2),(θ, -oo, oo))

\(\displaystyle \frac{\sqrt{2} \sqrt{\pi}}{2}\)
